p: The aim of this study is RP-HPLCâ€“DAD gradient elution analysis with the chemometric calculations of selected lavenders with confirmation of their identity and one unknown plant. Moreover, the antioxidant activity of Lavandulae extracts was calculated based on the total phenolic content using the Folin-Ciocalteu [ 28], FRAP [ 29] and DPPH [ 30] methods; all techniques were performer using the spectrophotometric methods.
